Literature.Title: Systematic study of non-natural short cationic lipopeptides as novel broad-spectrum antimicrobial agents.
Literature.Author: Lohan S, Cameotra SS, Bisht GS

Literature.Title: In vitro and in vivo antibacterial evaluation and mechanistic study of ornithine based small cationic lipopeptides against antibiotic resistant clinical isolates.
Literature.Author: Lohan S, Monga J, Cameotra SS, Bisht GS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli MTCC 723(MIC=3.1µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa MTCC 2295(MIC=3.1µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MTCC 3160(MIC=3.1µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis MTCC 2763(MIC=25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-1720(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 51625(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 24433(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Aspergillus fumigatus ATCC 42203(MIC=3.1µg/ml),Aspergillus niger ATCC 64028(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 2344(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=4.5-5µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=3.1-4.25µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae(MIC=5.5-7.5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium(MIC=4-5.5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=2-3.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=2.5-10µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=3-3.1µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=4.5-6.25µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=5-5.5µg/ml),Haemophilus Influenzae(MIC=10-12.5µg/ml)
